InterruptibleRMISocketFactory - Class in org.neilja.net.interruptiblermi
Decorates RMISocketFactory to return Socket and ServerSocket instances that support interruptible RMI.
InterruptibleRMISocketFactory() - Constructor for class org.neilja.net.interruptiblermi.InterruptibleRMISocketFactory
Create a new instance of this class, returning decorated sockets from RMISocketFactory.getDefaultSocketFactory().

InterruptibleRMIThreadFactory - Class in org.neilja.net.interruptiblermi
ThreadFactory implementation to support interruptibility of RMI calls.
isCurrentRMIServerThreadSocketAlive() - Static method in class org.neilja.net.interruptiblermi.InterruptibleRMISocketFactory
Return true if the socket associated with the RMI server thread (the current thread) has not been closed or marked for shutdown by the client of the RMI thread.

org.neilja.net.interruptiblermi - package org.neilja.net.interruptiblermi
